home_page.seo_title: MYFA, away has never been so close

launch_popup.title: Launch
launch_popup.paragraph1: Any order made will be delivered within one month, by the founders themselves!
launch_popup.paragraph2: End of the launch period: March 31, 2020. Take advantage of the low prices during this period!

slide2.title: Enter information about your loved one
slide2.description: We call them to determine the delivery conditions.

slide5.title: Delivery in less than 48 hours
slide5.description: Depending on the availability of your loved one.

slide6.title: Follow the route
slide6.description: By email or SMS, stay informed.

baskets.title: Choose your basket!
baskets.subtitle: Our products are in season, coming from producers. The composition of the baskets can therefore vary.
baskets.fruits_basket_description: The Fruits basket brings together up to 6 kilos of flavors that you can share with your loved ones.
baskets.vegetables_basket_description: At MYFA, we want to highlight the food crops that are used in local consumption. With this basket, you make your loved ones and the sellers / producers with whom we are in direct contact happy! üòâ
baskets.sauces_basket_description: Any good dish must be accompanied by an adequate sauce. Peanut sauce or Djoumgbl√© sauce ... Allow your loved ones to make them all! üòâ
baskets.custom_basket_home_description: It's up to you to compose it!
baskets.custom_basket_description: With this basket, we let you make the composition that best suits your loved ones. You can put a little of each basket and much more!

our_promise.title: Our promise
our_promise.paragraph_title: Ensure the well-being of your loved ones.
our_promise.paragraph_description: Sending money to family is good. Make sure they ate is even better.

team.title: The Team
team.doris_description: With MYFA, I wanted to create a way to be able to please, without frustrations. Here I know what becomes of my money.
team.florian_description: Our ambition is to provide a real good solution to the problems caused by distance. We bring families together.
team.alex_description: We offer you a new experience to delight your loved ones and maintain confidence despite the distance!

news.title: News
news.slide1_description: Last week we participated in the MobileOne conference. For two days, the event covers all aspects related to mobile, from technique to marketing. The various issues are dealt with in the form of 30-minute lectures.
news.slide2_description: If we had been told, 8 months ago, when we launched out, that things would materialize so quickly, I would not have believed it, and Doris neither. It has already been 1 week since we returned from our first "business trip", no more and no less than in C√¥te d'Ivoire. In Africa, a continent that is dear to us.
news.slide3_description: We agree, the name of the event is long. But the principle is simple! "Women", I believe you understood already, means that the promoters of projects are only women (Who run the world? Ask Beyonc√©).
news.slide4_description: Huh? What? What does "Myfa" mean? It means "family" in "verlan". Verlan is a form of French slang which consists of inverting the syllables of a word. So you understand now where the singer Stromae got his name from... The "y"? just for style...
